clues.text: The arrival of a Spanish woman causes problems for a man & his relationships with 2 American girls
Abused wife seeks refuge in movie theater, falls for the fictional leading man
Bodyguard kills his boss' girlfriend so that the show can go on
Ditzy prostitute is set up with boxer while Greek chorus weighs in on protagonist's fate
"Sugary" biography of pimp turned jazz guitar hero; he likes to shoot rats

That time of year thou may'st in me behold /
The easternmost Great Lake, so we are told

In the room the women come and go /
Talking of this largest Central American lake, amigo

It was many & many a year ago in a kingdom by this "sea" /
The 2nd & 4th largest lakes combined, can't compete with thee

I hate to be a kicker, I don't want to start a fracas /
It's 50 miles from Tovar & 300 from Caracas

Do not go gentle into this "ursine" Canadian lake /
Rage, rage against the cold; it can be just too much to take

rounds.comments: (Alex: In this category, [*] we're going to need more than just one of those names.)

clues.text: Despite the Chicago Tribune headline, he didn't defeat Truman

In 1935 Dr. Carl Weiss allegedly killed him in Louisiana

Pal, you've got no chance at trial; take this reduction of charges in exchange for admitting guilt to a lesser offense

It's the illegal enticing of a suspect into committing a crime; that's my story & I'm sticking to it
Formed in 930 A.D., the Althing of this country is one of the oldest legislative assemblies in the world
There are this many members of the Althing--they'll always fall one short of filling an entire checkerboard
This position that has the country's real power (& the cabinet) is appointed by the president with the Althing's approval
In 1874 the king of this nearby Scandinavian country vested the Althing with legislative power in internal affairs
The Althing had an upper & lower house until 1991; now it's this type of legislature, meaning "one chamber"
"I Was The One" was the flip side of this song, Elvis' first No. 1 single
"Fairy tales can come true, it can happen to you, if you're" this

rounds.text: The number of zeros in 1 trillion
